semantics.annotation: N=\left\lfloor 0.5-\log_{2}\left(\frac{\text{Frequency of this item}}{\text{ Frequency of most common item}}\right)\right\rfloor
\forall x,y\in A\;[x\neq y\rightarrow\neg\exists z\in X\;[z\leq x\land z\leq y% ]].
